Articles.Content:
Hi guys

I've been reworking my old beta designs and realized that literally none of them is good for 1.02

Ion engine hybrid SSTO doesnt do anything

Nuclear engine SSTO is not particularly effective and has to be really huge

even Rapier engines seem kinda underpowered

So through experimentation I ended up creating this.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Xf70ts2VEx4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Does anyone have any other ideas for how to SSTO in 1.02?

Why yes, they do. Check out [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118470-1-0-2-Any-hope-left-for-SSTOs). Or maybe [this one](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122178-Rapier-in-1-0-2-completely-useless).

I've seen several other threads around devoted to discussing SSTO's in 1.0.2.

Happy landings!

> 
> Why yes, they do. Check out [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118470-1-0-2-Any-hope-left-for-SSTOs). Or maybe [this one](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122178-Rapier-in-1-0-2-completely-useless).
> I've seen several other threads around devoted to discussing SSTO's in 1.0.2.
> 
> Happy landings!

thanks for the links!!

I was afraid it was just me lol
There are some pretty sweet 1.0.2 SSTO designs up on KerbalX - [see this search for 1.0.2 SSTOs](http://KerbalX.com?search=ssto)
